content:
Yes, Tokyo is famous for its delicious late-night eats, and there are many places to grab a bite to eat even after a long night of partying. Here are some popular ones:

1. Ichiran Ramen - This chain of ramen shops is open 24 hours a day and serves some of the most delicious and authentic bowls of ramen in Tokyo. 2. Tsukiji Market - The famous fish market is open early in the morning, so you can have some of the freshest and tastiest sushi and sashimi in town. 3. Shinjuku Omoide Yokocho - A small alleyway filled with restaurants and bars that serve yakitori (grilled chicken skewers), ramen, and other affordable eats. 4. Gonpachi - This restaurant is better known as the "Kill Bill restaurant" and is open 24 hours. It serves Japanese food in a stylish atmosphere. 5. Don Quijote - This discount store chain has many outlets that are open 24 hours and sell snacks, drinks, and other food items at reasonable prices. I hope you enjoy your visit to Tokyo!
